name: validate-code
description: Validate a code from valueset or codesystem

parameter.name: system
parameter.documentation: Code system that a code belongs to.

parameter.name: code
parameter.documentation: FHIR code that is to be validated.

parameter.name: display
parameter.documentation: Display of the code that is to be validated.

parameter.name: Parameters
parameter.documentation: FHIR parameter resource that contains a coding and ValueSet. (Used when doing a POST request)
